loginDescription: Shyiramo umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira mu gice cy'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'umuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
homePagePurpose: Kureberera neza amanota y'abanyeshuri, gutegura raporo, no koroshya imiyoborere y'ishuri.
homePageFeature2Desc: Kwinjiza amanota mu buryo bworoshye, kubara mu buryo bwikora, n'indangamanota zirambuye.
homePageFeature3Desc: Tegura raporo z'umusaruro ku munyeshuri, ku ishuri, no ku isomo.
languageSettingsDescription: Hitamo ururimi ukunda rwo kwerekana muri porogaramu.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho ibihitwamo rusange bya sisitemu n'amakuru y'ishuri.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kumenya niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe mu manota no muri raporo.
themeDescription: Uburyo bwijimye bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe akabuto k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe wa porogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha za imeyili ku byabaye muri sisitemu ziteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza kandi ntiziraboneka ubu.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Imikorere ihambaye nko kohereza raporo zose muri PDF/Excel, igenamiterere rirambuye rya raporo, n'igenamiterere ry'itumanaho (urugero, SMS/imenyesha za imeyili) biteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza cya Report-Manager Lite. Uburyo buriho bwa "Kohereza muri CSV" butanga gusa amakuru y'ibanze.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
